hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/47956faaefabe8097ec558278948ac9c.png)

We can take apart $\green{5}$ to make $\pink2$ and $\blue3$.  
We can put together $\pink2$ and $\blue3$ to make $\green{5}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$5-2=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $2=5$
